name: A. Minimums and Maximums
statement:
An array is if both of the following two conditions meet: there are l_1
and r_1 elements in the array equal to its minimum; there are l_2 and
r_2 elements in the array equal to its maximum. For example, the array
[2, 3, 2, 4, 4, 3, 2] has 3 elements equal to its minimum (1-st, 3-rd
and 7-th) and 2 elements equal to its maximum (4-th and 5-th).Another
example: the array [42, 42, 42] has 3 elements equal to its minimum and
3 elements equal to its maximum.Your task is to calculate the possible
number of elements in a array.
